ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They descend on every evil liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They come down to every mendacious sinner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They descend on every forgerer steeped in sin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They come to every sinful liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They descend on every great accuser, extreme sinner. (The magicians)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They descend on every lying, sinful person (Athim).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They descend upon every lying, sinful one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They come down on every guilty impostor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They descend on every sinful, false one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They descend on every lying sinner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They descend upon every calumniator, sinner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They descend on every sinful liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They descend on every lying, wicked person,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They descend on every lying (one who tells lies), sinful person.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They descend on every guilty impostor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They descend upon every sinful liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They descend upon every sinful liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:222] They descend upon every sinful, profligate, liar, such as Musaylama and other soothsayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They descend on every sinful, false one) they descend on every sinful fortune teller: Musaylimah the liar and Talhah.
